scripts.package: npm install && npx concurrently "npm run package:frontend" "npm run package:admin" && npm run start
scripts.audit:frontend: cd site && npm audit && npm audit fix
scripts.audit:admin: cd admin && npm audit && npm audit fix
scripts.audit: npx concurrently "npm run audit:frontend" "npm run audit:admin"
scripts.update:frontend: cd site && npm outdated && npm update
scripts.update:admin: cd admin && npm outdated && npm update
scripts.update: npx concurrently "npm run update:frontend" "npm run update:admin"
